quote: When one acts on pity against justice, it is the good whom one punishes for the sake of the evil; when one saves the guilty from suffering, it is the innocent whom one forces to suffer.
quote_letters: WHEN ONE ACTS ON PITY AGAINST JUSTICE IT IS THE GOOD WHOM ONE PUNISHES FOR THE SAKE OF THE EVIL WHEN ONE SAVES THE GUILTY FROM SUFFERING IT IS THE INNOCENT WHOM ONE FORCES TO SUFFER
